item.description:
Please join us for the second of what we hope will be a weekly event! Knitters and crocheters of all skill levels are invited to share the joy of yarn creativity, deep discussion, fun conversation and tea cake.

Cathy McIntyre of Gloucester has generously offered to teach those of us new to the art of knitting.

Beginners please bring a pair of knitting needles and maybe practice yarn. I have some yarn on hand as well.

Advanced knitters please bring along your work in progress and perhaps a finished item to show off.

Others doing hand work with fibers and fabrics are invited to join as well. We'd love to see you're projects!
item.how_to_find_us: Ring the bell at the door inside the front porch
item.why: It's a valuable and relaxing skill that allows us a chance to talk about loftier subjects while creating something beautiful and useful.
item.name: Knitting Group
